scripts.start: docker run --rm -p 8081:8080 -e KEYCLOAK_USER=admin -e KEYCLOAK_PASSWORD=admin -e KEYCLOAK_IMPORT=/tmp/alfresco-realm.json alfresco/identity-service
scripts.start:realm: docker run --rm -p 8081:8080 -e KEYCLOAK_USER=admin -e KEYCLOAK_PASSWORD=admin -e KEYCLOAK_IMPORT=/tmp/alfresco-realm.json -v $(pwd)/alfresco-realm.json:/tmp/alfresco-realm.json alfresco/identity-service
